name: Porter Orders the Embraer E195-E2!
description:
On July 12th, 2021, Canada’s Porter Airlines made quite the announcement, saying that they had ordered up to 80 Embraer 195-E2s for a major expansion across North America!

Today, I take a look at this announcement and what it means for them!
